name: Ghostly Gardening
description:
Ghostly Gardening

It's the year 2145. You're a ghost and Halloween is approaching. You want to grow the biggest pumpkin of the season and decide to take advantage of the city's automatic irrigation system to do so. Swap your pumpkin with the flowers being watered to make it grow. But watch out! Make sure not to do any permanent damage to the plants by letting them die. A ghost should, after all, be invisible.

Controls:  Arrow keys or AWSD to move, space to pick up and place plants.

Credits
Game Design: Both
Graphic Design: Illusia
Coding and Audio: PhindieGames

Known Issues:
You have to reload the game to restart.
You can break the game by swapping plants fast.

Planned post-jam patch:
 - main menu
 - restart button
 - intro cutscene which clarifies what the player is supposed to do
 - polish
